title: [Large-Scale] Culture-Centered Nursing Simulation: Enhancing Competency in Care for Burn Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and cultural competency
context.additional_context: Simulation-based cultural competency training accessible via mobile environments for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain burn treatment preferences among patients with diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can present at least three communication strategies reflecting cultural sensitivity
Learners can provide adaptive feedback on non-traditional treatment methods through mobile simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
